name: Pencil NX Block UI Styler Collection
tagline: Pencil Project UI Component Collection for the NX Blockstyler UI
body:
# Pencil NX Block UI Styler Collection
Pencil Project UI Component Collection for the NX Blockstyler UI

![rsh_pencil_nxblockuistyler_stencil_collection_sample_thumbnail](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20040078/16193892/f4694470-36f1-11e6-9120-33ebf6dfc44d.jpg)

- Description
- Goal
- Prerequisites
- Roadmap
- ToDo

## Description
The **Pencil NX Block UI Styler Collection** is a UI component collection,
that enables NXOpen API Programers to quickly prototype Block UI Styler based dialogue boxes.

## Goal
Use Pencil as the defacto standard Prototyping Tool for state of the art NXOpen UI Designs.

## Prerequisites:
This collection was developed for the use with Pencil Project.
It was initiated under Pencil V3 Beta.

## RoadMap
Repo init - Repository name, description and content defined
v0.0.0.1 alpha - small collection with minimum logic
                 Available components
                 Dialogue, Tabs, Groups, Subgroups, ActionButton, OK, APPLY, CANCEL, String Input


## ToDo
- implement/improve selection logic
- extend collection
  sub-sub-groups, radio & dropdown, checkbox, select ksys, ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
